ygData.subject: Re: teleporters
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would rather have larger teleporters.  I would rather have a couple of things when it comes to speed: 1)a maximum running speed 2)and a walk/run mode.

--- In gladiator@y..., Tom Tildrum <tevildoii@y...> wrote:
> I'd like to see teleporters that work when you pause
> on them, rather than just teleporting anyone who
> happens to step on them. This would probably also help
> with fast characters who can't ever seem to step on
> the one spot that would teleport them to where they
> want to go.
>    -T.

I would rather have larger teleporters.  I would rather have a couple 
of things when it comes to speed:

1)a maximum running speed
2)and a walk/run mode.
